name: acceptance-criteria-patterns
description: Measurable conditions that define when coordination request is successfully completed

acceptance_criteria: Architecture analysis covers all 3 inbox artifact types (coordination, task, proposal)
Feasibility assessment addresses technical alignment, quality potential, and maintenance burden
Integration options comparison includes ≥2 approaches with effort estimates
Recommendation includes clear GO/NO-GO/DEFER criteria based on ≥80% technical feasibility

acceptance_criteria.guidance:
Generate measurable acceptance criteria that verify deliverables are complete and high-quality. Each criterion should:
1. Map to one or more deliverables (verify what was requested)
2. Be objectively verifiable (tool-based or clear manual process)
3. Include quantitative thresholds where applicable (≥80%, <100ms, ≥3 examples)
4. Be phrased as positive condition ('X passes Y' not 'X doesn't fail Y')
5. Be independently testable

Request type patterns:
- Exploratory (4-10 criteria): Coverage (addresses X, includes Y), completeness (≥N examples), structure (follows framework)
- Prescriptive (8-15 criteria): Tests pass (≥80% coverage), benchmarks (<100ms), validation (schema passes), documentation (≥85% clarity)
- Peer Review (5-10 criteria): Review depth (≥3 comparisons), actionability (≥5 suggestions), constructiveness (specific examples)

If user provided acceptance_criteria, refine them to be measurable. If not provided, derive from deliverables.

exploratory: Feasibility assessment addresses technical alignment, quality potential, and maintenance burden
Analysis references ≥3 real coordination request examples
prescriptive: scripts/translate-bidirectional.py achieves ≥80% test coverage (measured via pytest)
Performance benchmarks demonstrate <100ms translation time for payloads ≤10KB
peer_review: Alignment assessment compares against ≥3 existing chora-base SAPs for consistency
Recommendations include ≥5 specific, actionable improvement suggestions with examples

acceptance_criteria.error_message: acceptance_criteria must be array of 2-25 strings, each 15-250 characters

metadata.stability_note: May evolve during clarification, frozen at acceptance
